properties.name: serpapi.key
properties.description: API key for SerpAPI service used for patent search.

properties.name: serpapi.base.url
properties.description: Base URL for SerpAPI service endpoint.

properties.name: mail.password
properties.description: Email password or app-specific password for SMTP authentication.

properties.name: admin.email
properties.description: Administrator email address for system notifications and admin operations.

properties.name: app.admin.email
properties.description: Administrator email address for application-level notifications and admin operations.

properties.name: app.email.enabled
properties.description: Feature toggle to enable or disable email functionality globally.
